external_games.name: Metal Gear Solid: Fight of the Metal Gears

name: Metal Gear Solid: Fight of the Metal Gears
summary: The legendary fanfiction written by squirrelking will be illustrated by brilliant graphics in widescreen 360p resolution and fully voiced cinematic sequences! Fight of the Metal Gears lets players be Jake Snake himself, the son of the legendary Solid Snake. After Solid Snake's tragic death, Jake receives an urgent call from Otacon who informs him of Metal Gears in Out Heaven. Jake Snake decides to continue his father's legacy of destroying Metal Gears and killing bad guys!
